response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This offering holds immense value to us and we believe it will be equally beneficial for you. Given its intrinsic worth to us, we are extending this opportunity to you at a special price of $950,000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
